episodes.description: Broadcasters'Eye showcases excellent programs produced by Japanese commercial broadcasters.This episode tells the tale of an  Ainu man trying to save his indigenous culture.
episodes.subtitle: Notebooks of Heritage: Reclaiming Traditions of the Ainu People
episodes.title: Broadcasters' Eye

episodes.description: Broadcasters' Eye showcases excellent programs produced by Japanese commercial broadcasters. This episode focuses on the stories of two young people in a small fishing town who dream of great hauls.
episodes.subtitle: Dreaming of Great Hauls: Passing the Baton
episodes.title: Broadcasters' Eye

episodes.description: This program gives a touching portrait of nine-year-old Michitsuji Yuna, a strong and determined blind girl from the city of Isahaya in Nagasaki Prefecture who dreams of delighting people as a singer.
episodes.subtitle: Yuna's Song of Light
episodes.title: Broadcasters' Eye
